1.11.2.1.2.1: - Improved locating a safe arrival point and placed teleporters attempt to link to pre-existing teleporters before creating a new one.
1.11.2.1.2.0:
- Fixed the text formatting for the config options where that was broken
- The Darkness now actually checks if it's dark before trying to damage the player
- Added a configurable crafting recipe for the Teleporter (can be enabled/disabled in the config, disabled by default)
1.11.2.1.1.1:
- Ghost Teleporter block no longer appear if teleporting out from The Beneath with a Teleporter placed inside it
- Ported to 1.11.2

1.10.2.1.2.0:
- Fixed the text formatting for the config options where that was broken
- The Darkness now actually checks if it's dark before trying to damage the player
- Added a configurable crafting recipe for the Teleporter (can be enabled/disabled in the config, disabled by default)
1.10.2.1.1.1: - Ghost Teleporter block no longer appear if teleporting out from The Beneath with a Teleporter placed inside it
1.10.2.1.1.0:
- The damage and health boost of mobs inside The Beneath should no longer spiral out of control and reach 5 digit numbers
- Added a config option that allows you to stop mob spawning inside The Beneath
- Added a config option for the Spawn Weight of the Shadows.
- Grue is no longer required (but the mode will switch to darkness if set to grue while Grue isn't installed)
- Now runs on Forge 12.18.3.2185
